column2: geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X.Y1 + 1.96*X.Y1.1), linetype = "dashed", color = "red", size = 0.8) +
geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X.Y1 - 1.96*X.Y1.1), linetype = "dashed", color = "red", size = 0.8) +
geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X.Y1), color = "orange", size = 1) +
ggtitle("Local level estimated state with 95% CI") +
